content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=37.0, y=-85.0)
Complex of mining drills and inserters for coal extraction:
- Three burner mining drills at positions (41.0,-86.0), (39.0,-85.0), and (37.0,-85.0)
- Wooden chests at (40.5,-87.5), (39.5,-83.5), and (36.5,-86.5) collecting coal
- Burner inserters at (35.5,-86.5) and (35.5,-85.5) moving coal between chests

### Iron/Copper Ore Mining at position(x=-28.0, y=-61.0)
Mining setup for iron and copper ore:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0,-61.0)
- Wooden chest at (-27.5,-59.5) collecting ore
- Burner inserter at (-26.5,-59.5) moving ore
- Connected to transport belt system

### Iron Mining Complex at position(x=-10.0, y=-59.0)
Series of mining drills for iron ore:
- Three burner mining drills at (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), and (-6.0,-59.0)
- Wooden chests at (-9.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-57.5), (-5.5,-57.5)
- Multiple burner inserters moving ore between components
- Connected to transport belt system

### Smelting Line at position(x=0.0, y=0.0)
Large smelting setup:
- Four stone furnaces at (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), and (6.0,0.0)
- Input wooden chests at (0.5,-2.5), (2.5,-2.5), (4.5,-2.5), (6.5,-2.5)
- Output wooden chests at (0.5,2.5), (2.5,2.5), (4.5,2.5), (6.5,2.5)
- Multiple burner inserters moving items between chests and furnaces
- Connected to transport belt system

### Power Generation System at position(x=4.5, y=20.5)
Power generation setup:
- Steam engine at (4.5,20.5)
- Boiler at (-1.5,22.0)
- Offshore pump at (-3.5,27.5)
- Connected via pipe system
- Small electric pole network connecting power to other structures

ERROR TIPS

### Fluid Connection Errors
- When connecting pipes between steam engines and boilers, ensure proper alignment and valid connection points
- Check that fluid boxes are properly connected in sequence from offshore pump -> boiler -> steam engine

### Entity Status Issues
- Ensure fuel (coal) is supplied to burner entities before expecting them to work
- Monitor chest capacities - full output chests will block production

### Transport Belt Layout
- Verify belt connections are continuous and properly oriented
- Ensure inserters have valid pickup and drop-off positions relative to belts

### Power System Setup
- Steam engines require proper fluid connections to work
- Verify all components (pump -> boiler -> steam engine) are properly connected in sequence
